name: mp3-transcriber-app
description: Full-Stack-Webapp für MP3-Transkription und -Zusammenfassung mit React und Node.js

scripts.build-deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy-frontend
scripts.deploy-frontend: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force server/public -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Recurse client/build server/public; Write-Host '✅ Frontend deployed' -ForegroundColor Green"
scripts.rebuild-all: npm run install-all && npm run build-deploy
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
